answers.answer: Lucky you! Im due tomorrow too (hoping that the full moon brings on babies lol) but my dr wont set a date for induction until im 41weeks :( so far im still the same 80% effaced 2cm dilated....well at least you know youll see you baby in less then a week!
Due tomorrow as well :) hoping it actually happens but in same boat as turnip....doc won't do induction until 28th if I don't have baby before then.
2 days over being induced Sunday!! I'm with you BabyTurnip!!! Make sure you walk outside though lol!
Monday is my big c section day, my pregnancy has gone as fast until last week when I found out when he would be here now it's creeping by.... Wish Monday would hurry up already!!
I'm six days overdue , doctors avoid me when I ask about being induced . No sighn  of labor except a soft cervix .

How long can they really avoid it for??? Your gonna have to have that baby one way or the other lol so we have a few august babies that are being stubbirn eh? How exciting lol being a Leo myself i know how stubborn we can be :P well its a full moon tonight ladies!!! Old wivetales say full moon bring on babies!
I'm due Thursday, I'm 1cm dialated and 50% effaced. Lol these babies are stubborn.

I don't really think you can call them stubborn, really, until after 42 weeks.But as for me, I'm 39+5, due on Thursday. Last Thursday I went in to be induced due to high blood pressure (borderline preeclampsia) but I wasn't progressing after the prostaglandin gels. Since my HELLP panel came back fine and my blood pressure wasn't too high, they let me go home on modified bed rest. It's true, once you think the baby is coming everything seems to slow to a crawl!

Shoot, that should say last Friday I went in for the induction. This Friday I'm going in for an ultrasound and another non-stress test (had one on Monday) and I might get a membrane sweep if my doctor thinks it's time.

I'm 38+3 and soooo hopin the full moon works its magic on us mamas tonight! Lol I have had no sign of labor yet and it's almost 11pm here but hey, there's still a bit of time! Lol I go in to the dr tomorrow so maybe it'll work it's magic by getting me dilated and ready to go cuz I've made no progress so far and it's pretty annoying =[ and what's weird is last night and tonight I've had some cramping that's gone into my back and sometimes a little painful but this morning it was gone and just now returning now that I'm getting ready for bed...

question: I'm due tomorrow! Went to my ob today and if no baby by Monday I'm going in at 8pm to start inducing! So excited and ready to meet my sweet boy!!!
title: august mommies??
